Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type

Interface ISequenceType

public interface ISequenceType
Supports sequence type testing.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ISequenceType
    empty()
    A sequence type representing an empty sequence.
    Occurrence
    getOccurrence()
    Get the occurrence of the sequence.
    IItemType
    getType()
    Get the type of the sequence.
    boolean
    isEmpty()
    Determine if the sequence is empty (if it holds any data) or not.
    boolean
    matches(ICollectionValue value)
    Tests that a given collection value matches this sequence type.
    static ISequenceType
    of(IItemType type, Occurrence occurrence)
    Create new sequence type using the provide type and occurrence.
    String
    toSignature()
    Get the signature of the function as a string.

  • Method Details

    • empty

      @NonNull static ISequenceType empty()
      A sequence type representing an empty sequence.
      Returns:
      the sequence type

    • of

      @NonNull static ISequenceType of(@NonNull IItemType type, @NonNull Occurrence occurrence)
      Create new sequence type using the provide type and occurrence.
      Parameters:
      type - the required sequence item type
      occurrence - the expected occurrence of the sequence
      Returns:
      the new sequence type

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Determine if the sequence is empty (if it holds any data) or not.
      Returns:
      true if the sequence is empty or false otherwise

    • getType

      @NonNull IItemType getType()
      Get the type of the sequence.
      Returns:
      the type of the sequence or null if the sequence is empty

    • getOccurrence

      @NonNull Occurrence getOccurrence()
      Get the occurrence of the sequence.
      Returns:
      the occurrence of the sequence or Occurrence#ZERO if the sequence is empty

    • toSignature

      @NonNull String toSignature()
      Get the signature of the function as a string.
      Returns:
      the signature

    • matches

      boolean matches(@NonNull ICollectionValue value)
      Tests that a given collection value matches this sequence type.
      Parameters:
      value - the collection value to test
      Returns:
      true if the value matches the expectations of this sequence type or false otherwise
